body_html:
@boeddeker, I understand that it might be not easy.
BUILD file is configured for bazel, which is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and Gradle. Those are some tutorials which perhaps are useful for you:

  • Getting Started with Bazel
  • Introduction to Bazel: Building a C++ Project
  • Concepts and Terminology
body_text:
@boeddeker, I understand that it might be not easy.
BUILD file is configured for bazel, which is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and Gradle. Those are some tutorials which perhaps are useful for you:

Getting Started with Bazel
Introduction to Bazel: Building a C++ Project
Concepts and Terminology
body:
@boeddeker, I understand that it might be not easy.
BUILD file is configured for [bazel](https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/bazel-overview.html), which is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and Gradle. Those are some tutorials which perhaps are useful for you:
+ [Getting Started with Bazel](https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/getting-started.html)
+ [Introduction to Bazel: Building a C++ Project](https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/tutorial/cpp.html)
+ [Concepts and Terminology](https://docs.bazel.build/versions/master/build-ref.html#BUILD_files)
